note.#text: This feature is available by subscription only. For more information, contact your LexisNexis representative.

ph.#tail: Advanced Search Form, you can access business and non-business credit reports from Dun & Bradstreet (D&B).

p: You can search using the following options:

b.#tail: - The Business Information Report provides an overall profile of a company, including the registered names of a company (including its DBAs). It also provides information and analysis to help you evaluate a firm's operations, profitability, and stability. This report can provide payment information, banking, finance, public filings, special events, company history, and management history.

- The Comprehensive Report is an analytical tool that helps you assess new and existing business relationships where the large-dollar and long-term nature of the commitment pose a significant risk or opportunity to your business. This report combines D&B's predictive scores with the value of business and payment information and helps you determine both the current profile and future outlook for an account.

- The Business Background Report provides useful information on a company's history and operations as well as the business background of its management. It generally includes a business summary and special events section.

dlentry.dd: Enter the full name of the business. If you are using the business name as your primary search criteria, you must specify a country and a state to successfully complete the search.
Enter the information required to complete the search. (Optional fields are marked as such.)

dlentry.dt: Company telephone number (for U.S. businesses only)
dlentry.dd: If you know the telephone number of the company headquarters, enter it here. Use the format (country code, area code, prefix, etc.) that is appropriate for the target country.
Dun & Bradstreet's unique 9-digit Data Universal Numbering System (D-U-N-S) number is internationally recognized as a global business identifier. If you know it, enter the full number here.
